Title: Harley Davidson and the Marlboro Man
Actors: Mickey Rourke, Don Johnson, Chelsea Field, Daniel Baldwin
Plot: The tough biker Harley and his no less tough cowboy friend Marlboro learn that an old friend of theirs will lose his bar, because a bank wants to build a new complex there and demands 2.5 million dollars for a new contract in advance. Harley and Marlboro decide to help him by robbing the corrupt bank. They rob the Bank transport and get hold of an amount of a new synthetic drug. Now they are targeted by criminal bankers.
